name: Hellokids - Vol. 1: Coloring and Painting
description:
Imagine a coloring book on your Nintendo DSi system! Add the possibility to create your own drawings and to draw over photos. And you end up with Hellokids!

Hellokids is:

• Coloring and drawing using the Nintendo DSi stylus!

• More than 150 drawings for coloring in with three difficulty levels, including a “color containment” assistant.

• A Freehand Drawing mode with simple practical tools: several thicknesses of pen, automatic fill function, color palette, decorations, etc.

• Draw on a photo you have taken or a photo uploaded from the Nintendo DSi album.

Hellokids: a great pocket companion for all budding artists!
